games.title: Homeworld 3
games.description: Tactical, beautiful, and wholly unique, the GOTY-winning sci-fi RTS returns with Homeworld 3. Assume control and battle through fleet combat in dazzling, fully 3D space while the award-winning story unfolds on a galactic scale.

games.title: Superior
games.description: Superior is a co-op, roguelite, third person shooter game where you have to run a series of missions that are generated dynamically with special objectives, enemies and environments.

games.title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader
games.description: Made in a close partnership with Games Workshop, Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is a story-rich classical RPG from Owlcat Games, developers of the critically acclaimed game, Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous.

games.title: Killing Floor 3
games.description: It’s 2091 and megacorp Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monsters called zeds. Now, join the rebel group Nightfall in this co-op action/horror FPS that puts you and your teammates in a battle for the future of humanity.

games.title: GALAHAD 3093
games.description: GALAHAD 3093 is a mech-based hero shooter set in a sci-fi future imbued with Arthurian legend. Choose your Knight, customize their Lance, and fight in 32 player arena combat. Collect mods and weapons to upgrade your Lance and craft your own playstyle.

games.title: Men of War II
games.description: Men of War II, the anticipated sequel to the acclaimed RTS franchise is here with all-new units, locations, campaigns, and game modes, combined with the series’ trademark historical accuracy and action-filled gameplay on the Eastern and Western Fronts of WW2.

games.title: Dangerous Waters
games.description: S.C.S. - Dangerous Waters allows you total control over multiple air, surface, and submarine platforms in a modern-day naval environment. Take direct control of individual crew stations and also plan and execute combined arms naval strategies.

games.title: Matchpoint - Tennis Championships
games.description:
The season starts now – grab your racket and become the world’s next tennis champion!
Matchpoint – Tennis Championships is a modern take on tennis, featuring a true-to-life on-court experience supported by a deep career mode and unique rivalry system.

games.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
games.description: Discover Chornobyl Exclusion Zone full of dangerous enemies, deadly anomalies and powerful artifacts. Unveil epic story on your way to the Heart of Chornobyl. Make your choices wisely, as they will determine your fate in the end.

games.title: Rollers of The Realm: Reunion
games.description: Flip, dash, bounce and battle through an epic campaign starring five pinball heroes with unique stats, physics and upgrades. Arcade action meets RPG progression and skill mastery as you confront the power of The Ancient and rekindle forgotten alliances.

games.title: Blazing Sails
games.description: Fight for survival in Blazing Sails, a fast-paced pirate PvP game! Create your own unique pirate and ship. Band together with other players to command your mighty vessel! Explore different game-modes, maps, weapons, ship types and more while eliminating other crews in epic battles on land and sea!

games.title: Distant Worlds 2
games.description: Distant Worlds Returns! Distant Worlds, the critically acclaimed 4X space strategy game is back with a brand new 64-bit engine, 3D graphics and a polished interface to begin an epic new Distant Worlds series with Distant Worlds 2.

games.title: SKULL AND BONES™
games.description: Enter the perilous paradise of Skull and Bones™ as you overcome the odds and rise from an outcast to infamous pirate.

games.title: Vampire: The Masquerade® - Bloodlines™ 2
games.description: Enter the World of Darkness and rise through vampire society. Experience Seattle - a city full of alluring, dangerous characters and factions. In this sequel to the cult classic, your choices, plots and schemes will change the balance of power.

games.title: Gangs of Sherwood
games.description: Fight the armies of the Sheriff of Nottingham and lead the rebellion, solo or in co-op with up to 4 players. Play as one of the Merry Men, combine your attacks, and free the people in this futuristic dystopia inspired by the legend of Robin Hood.

games.title: Selfloss
games.description: Selfloss is an adventure game set in a world of Slavic and Icelandic folklore. As the player, you take on the role of an old man with a magical staff who wanders seas and lakes, battling mythical creatures and helping those in need by healing their souls.

games.title: Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER
games.description: Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER

games.title: Judas
games.description: A disintegrating starship. A desperate escape plan. You are the mysterious and troubled Judas. Your only hope for survival is to make or break alliances with your worst enemies.

games.title: Metalstorm
games.description:
Welcome to Metalstorm, the ultimate team-based multiplayer air combat experience! 

A truly free-to-play game. Engage in live 5v5 air combat with friends against real players around the world. Collect and upgrade the world’s most advanced and legendary jets.

games.title: Pacific Drive
games.description: Survive the anomaly-filled Olympic Exclusion Zone with a car as your only lifeline. Scavenge resources from abandoned research sites, load up your trusty station wagon, and drive like hell to make it through alive. This run-based driving survival adventure arrives in 2023.

games.title: Soundfall
games.description: Soundfall is a dungeon crawler that combines looter-shooter action with rhythm-based gameplay. Venture out solo or with up to 4 friends locally or online. The closer you time your actions to the rhythm of the soundtrack, the more powerful you become!

games.title: Nivalis
games.description: Grow your business, manage restaurants and nightclubs, make friends and enemies, buy and decorate apartments, go fishing and maybe even find love in Nivalis, the city that stretches from the ocean to the clouds.

games.title: Escape The Loop
games.description: What if I told you, we've done this before? You've read this text, you've looked at these screenshots, and you've watched this trailer. Not once, but a hundred times. Maybe even more. And in five minutes, you won't remember any of it – and do it all over again

games.title: The Siege and the Sandfox
games.description: A 2D stealth Metroidvania with parkour platforming. Explore the majestic palace and ancient prisons of a kingdom under siege. Don the mantle of the legendary Sandfox as you venture into the ruins below, and discover the true threat from a sand-borne evil.

games.title: PixelJunk Eden 2
games.description: Return to the gardens of light and sound in this hypnotic platforming adventure from the award-winning PixelJunk series. Brought to life in stunning 4K with both art direction and a mesmerising soundtrack from the celebrated multimedia artist Baiyon.

games.title: Ultros
games.description: ULTROS is a psychedelic metroidvania where you wake up stranded on The Sarcophagus — a cosmic uterus holding an ancient, demonic being. Trapped in the loop of a black hole, you will have to explore The Sarcophagus and meet its inhabitants to understand the part you play.

games.title: Stargate: Timekeepers
games.description: "Stargate: Timekeepers is a real-time tactics game where you lead a team of specialists through a story-driven campaign set in the SG-1 universe. Use your characters' unique skills, craft the plan to unravel a timeloop mystery, and defeat the Goa’uld threat."

games.title: Hotel: A Resort Simulator
games.description: You are the manager of a hotel in an idyllic location. Build, design and develop your hotel, while creating unforgettable memories for your guests through expert management and by offering exceptional entertainment.

games.title: Rune Fencer Illyia
games.description: Rune Fencer Illyia is an intense, atmospheric action-platformer with a heavy focus on exploration and combat. Traverse an enormous and dangerous world, meet strange allies, and outfight your numerous foes with fast-paced swordplay and stolen runic magic.

games.title: Exotic Cars VI
games.description: The game tries to capture real life, when a brand launches a new product it is reflected in the game. This allows the player to integrate into the world organically and easily, the player can eat, drink, drive any brand of car, buy clothes, etc.
games.publisherName: Lany Games Inc S.A de C.V.

games.title: John Carpenter’s Toxic Commando
games.description: Pick a character and team up with three friends ‘cause it’s time to save the world. Obliterate terrifying hordes of monsters in intense and FPS action! You may not be on the best team of mercenaries, but you are… a Toxic Commando!

games.title: The Anacrusis
games.description: The Anacrusis is a four-player, co-op first-person shooter set aboard a starship stranded at the edge of explored space. Team up with your friends in an infinitely-replayable fight against alien hordes and unlock perks, weapons, and new ways to play!

games.title: Eville
games.description: Betray your friends - and lie your way to victory. In the multiplayer social deduction game Eville you find yourself in a village riddled by a series of murders. Some say it might have been you - or was it? Convince others you're not a murderer to stay alive!

games.title: REPLACED
games.description: REPLACED is a 2.5D sci-fi retro-futuristic action platformer where you play as R.E.A.C.H. - an artificial intelligence trapped in a human body against its own will. REPLACED combines cinematic platformer, pixel art, and free-flow action combat.

games.title: Disney Speedstorm
games.description: Disney Speedstorm

games.title: RoboCop: Rogue City
games.description: Become the iconic part man, part machine, all cop hero as you attempt to bring justice to the dangerous, crime-ridden streets of Old Detroit.

games.title: Hades II
games.description: Battle beyond the Underworld using dark sorcery to take on the Titan of Time in this bewitching sequel to the Game-of-the-Year-winning rogue-like dungeon crawler.

games.title: Frostpunk 2
games.description: Frostpunk 2 is the sequel to the highly acclaimed society survival game. The age of steam has passed and now, oil leads the way as humanity’s newest salvation. However, with new threats on the horizon, the future of the city looks even grimmer than before.

games.title: Broken Roads
games.description: Broken Roads is a narrative-driven RPG that brings exploration, strategic turn-based combat and meaningful philosophical choices to an all-new Australian post-apocalyptic setting.

games.title: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story
games.description: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story is a crafting RPG set in the whimsical world of Bandle City. After a party goes wrong, the portal system collapses and throws everything into chaos! Only you can restore the portals to save Bandle City.
